verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> I have called <S%H7121><s%> on you. <S%H2363><s%> Come to me quickly! Listen <S%H238><s%> to my voice <S%H6963><s%> when I call to you. <S%H7121><s%>

Let my prayer <S%H8605><s%> be set <S%H3559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you like incense; <S%H7004><s%> the lifting up <S%H4864><s%> of my hands <S%H3709><s%> like the evening <S%H6153><s%> sacrifice. <S%H4503><s%>
Set <S%H7896><s%> a watch, <S%H8108><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> before my mouth. <S%H6310><s%> Keep <S%H5341><s%> the door <S%H1817><s%> of my lips. <S%H8193><s%>

Don't <S%H5186><s%> incline my heart <S%H3820><s%> to any evil <S%H7451><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> to practice deeds <S%H5949><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%> with men <S%H376><s%> who work <S%H5949><s%> iniquity. <S%H205><s%> Don't <S%H3898><s%> let me eat of their delicacies. <S%H4516><s%>

Let the righteous <S%H6662><s%> strike <S%H1986><s%> me, <S%H2617><s%> it is kindness; let him reprove <S%H3198><s%> me, <S%H8081><s%> it is like oil on the head; <S%H7218><s%> don't <S%H7218><s%> let my head refuse <S%H5106><s%> it; <S%H8605><s%> Yet my prayer is always against evil deeds. <S%H7451><s%>

Their judges <S%H8199><s%> are thrown <S%H8058><s%> down by the sides <S%H3027><s%> of the rock. <S%H5553><s%> They will hear <S%H8085><s%> my words, <S%H561><s%> for they are well spoken. <S%H5276><s%>
"As when one plows <S%H6398><s%> and breaks <S%H1234><s%> up the earth, <S%H776><s%> our bones <S%H6106><s%> are scattered <S%H6340><s%> at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Sheol. <S%H7585><s%>"
For my eyes <S%H5869><s%> are on you, <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, the Lord. <S%H136><s%> In you, <S%H2620><s%> I take refuge. Don't <S%H6168><s%> leave my soul <S%H5315><s%> destitute. <S%H6168><s%>
Keep <S%H8104><s%> me from the snare <S%H3027><s%> which they have laid <S%H3369><s%> for me, <S%H4170><s%> from the traps of the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity. <S%H205><s%>
Let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> together into their own nets, <S%H4364><s%> while <S%H3162><s%> I pass by. <S%H5674><s%>
